name: Inverted (itch) (Gdev Studios)
description:
Inverted is a dropper-style game, but the only way to survive is by inverting the player's color in order to make the platforms blend in with the background! Try to survive as long as possible and try to beat your previous high score! The deeper you go the faster you fall. Good Luck!

How To Play:

Space: Invert the Players Color to prevent from running into a platform

Extra Info: The reason this game only uses black and white is because it was made for the 1 bit jam in which I could only use 2 colors! Thank You For Playing!
